ai-ya3.3.6:1.1_0: One who doesn’t completely understand that.
ai-ya3.3.6:2.1_0: But when there is such a sense-sphere, they will be able to completely understand the eye,
ai-ya3.3.6:3.1_0: One who doesn’t completely understand the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception.
ai-ya3.3.6:4.1_0: they won’t even see the path they’re missed. Because of this way they don’t consum.
ai-ya3.3.6:4.1_1: Don’t see the origin of the road, nor will they be able to understand the dimension of infinite space,
ai-ya3.3.6:5.1_0: But one who doesn’t completely understand that the fields of contact will be completely understood.
ai-ya3.3.6:6.1_0: he does not completely understand the sense fields, nor will he cleans (perception).
ai-ya3.3.6:6.1_1: They won’t even see the origin of the path, nor will they be able to understand the dimension of infinite space.
ai-ya3.3.6:8.1_0: The Book of the Six sense-spheres is finished.
